For the meat,it's advisable to have a quick medium high flame, so roast the outside parts and leave the inside ones softer and juicy.
 The flesh of Pork should always be eaten well cooked due to the risk of cysts tapeworm.

To obtain a perfect cooking you can use a kitchen thermometer and measure the INTERNAL temperature of the meat, at its center Of the piece of meat we are cooking.
 40 degree: red meat, rare
 50 degree: red meat, medium/rare
 60 degree: red meat, medium
 65 degree: medium , lamb, liver, duck, game 
 70 degree: red meat, well. Coscia e lombata di agnello.
 72 degree: calf, Lamb shoulder, poultry chicken, game, salmon, pig 
 74 degree: Boiled beef, offal, poultry, turkey, pharaoh, rabbit, fish 
 78 degree: Calf belly, calfskin and pork
 82 degree: Braised beef, damp meats in general
